019
020import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
021import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
022import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
023import net.tnemc.core.hook.papi.Placeholder;
024import net.tnemc.core.manager.PlaceholderManager;
025import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
026import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
027
028import java.util.Optional;
029
030/**
031 * BalancePlaceholder
032 *
033 * @author creatorfromhell
034 * @since 0.1.4.0
035 */
036public class BalanceCurRegStorPlaceholder implements Placeholder {
037
038  /**
039   * Retrieves the identifier associated with this symbol.
040   *
041   * @return The identifier as a string
042   */
043  @Override
044  public String identifier() {
045
046    return "tne_balance_curregstor";
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Checks if the specified parameters are valid for this method.
051   *
052   * @param params The parameters to be checked
053   *
054   * @return True if the parameters are valid, false otherwise
055   */
056  @Override
057  public boolean applies(final String[] params) {
058
059    return params[0].equalsIgnoreCase("balance") && params.length >= 3
060           && params[1].equalsIgnoreCase("curregstor");
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Processes a request with the given account and parameters.
065   *
066   * @param account Optional account associated with the request
067   * @param params  Required parameters for the request
068   *
069   * @return Nullable string response from the request process
070   */
071  @Override
072  public @Nullable String onRequest(@Nullable final String account, @NotNull final String[] params) {
073
074    if(account == null) {
075      return null;
076    }
077
078    final Optional<Account> accountOptional = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(account);
079
080    if(accountOptional.isEmpty()) {
081      return null;
082    }
083
084    final Optional<Currency> currency = TNECore.eco().currency().find(params[2]);
085    if(currency.isEmpty()) {
086
087      return null;
088    }
089
090    final String region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(params[3]);
091    final boolean formatted = (params[params.length - 1].equalsIgnoreCase("formatted"));
092
093    return PlaceholderManager.parseHoldings(accountOptional.get(), region,
094                                            currency.get().getUid(),
095                                            params[4], formatted);
096  }
097}
